reviews.review: топ за свои деньги, как и первая часть

I should have written this review a long time ago.

Some people see this game as just a good puzzle-game from Valve. But it's something more. I played this game on a pirated version when I was in elementary school. It was the first game that I fully completed. Ten years have passed since then.

At that time, I was amazed this combination of exciting storyline, lively characters, humor, interesting gameplay and the soul of the game with his community. Portal 2 had influenced my perception of games in general.

Every year I replay the game story with the same interest. And final song of the turrets gives me goosebumps. I love this excellent game and believe that Portal 2 will forever remain in the history of the gaming industry as a phenomenon.
Why my ball the size of Jupiter

More tests than Portal, even more interesting.
Amazing story does get frustating at times if you cant clear a leval

If you liked the first game, or even if you didn't play the first game, this is a game many will like for its physics, gameplay, different style of puzzles, and the story itself. The story has both a serious and comedic style mixed with a bit of science. While the previous game had a better story, this one has better gameplay for it has new puzzle types along with the new features such as co-op and community creation.
8/10

真g2好玩儿，塑料袋已经用完一卷了，吐出的都是快乐^^

Gioco bellissimo da giocare in coop e anche in singolo, giocandolo ci si immerge molto e ogni livello richiede uno studio sulle tecniche da utilizzare per superarlo. Nessun Bug o alcun tipo di problema. Lo consiglio vivamente a chi piacciono i giochi di logica e allo stesso tempo avventura con una storia che ti segue e ti accompagna lungo tutto il percorso. Estremamente soddisfatto, unica pecca è che potevano essere aggiunti livelli di più in coop, in 15 ore di gioco ho finito sia la storia in singolo che i lvl in coop.
Прикольная головоломка нужно думать головой а не 5 точкой тела.
BRILLIANT GAME story is fantastic, characters are awesome, puzzles are difficult and interesting, definetly in my list of top 10 games.

This game is a masterpiece. It has great gameplay, great puzzle, well written and suprisingly a really fun and entertaining story. It also has a really fun duo co-op mode with an all new story. Seriously tho this is among one of the best puzzle game ever created. 10/10

P.S. : I still think the co-op need more level and a better story
This is a masterful puzzler with action elements that is a must buy for all pc owners.

[h1]I didnt even know that i loves this kind of puzzle games ![/h1]

I usually play rpg/mmorpg games, only tried portal 2 because of sales and the 97,53% good rating reviews. But wow when i tried it for the first time playing multiplayer with my friend its instanly got me hooked. Played 10 hrs straight for the co-op and we finished it, now im going to try for the single player mode and maybe getting that achievement.

If you still have doubt to buy it or not, just buy it ! It have good rating for reasons :). U gonna loves the challenging puzzles its not too easy nor too hard that makes u stressed out, the difficulty is just the right amount even for a new player that never play portal 1 / portal 2 before, the sarcastic and annoying GLaDOS will be there for u too, to makes fun of u ofc, and more importantly portal 2 have good community, theres ton of maps on workshop out there to make sure u are not out of puzzles. 

[b]Easy 10/10 for gameplay, music, graphic, story and dozen hours of fun[/b] for the 10$ or even 1$ when on sales. Buy and try it to make sure u didnt missed out to play one of best games out there ! If u ever have a doubt about all the positive review on portal 2, believe me, u gonna end up giving positive reviews instead.

Exceptional puzzle game. Valve does it again, bringing innovation and breathing new life into every genre they touch. Even all the years this has been out, it still holds up really well, with sound physics and puzzle solving that makes you really feel like a part of Aperture.
This game is one of my absolute favorites. Not only does this game have heaps of puzzle solving fun, but this game also has an incredible narrative which makes this game so incredible.

This is better than portal 1 because there is more game play and more story to it and we learn a bit about GlaDOS instead of thinking she is only a killing machine (she literally is, but not anymore.)

This game is one of the best sequels I have ever played. The way Portal 2 interconnects with the first Portal is absolutely amazing! The story-line and work put into the environmental effects is worth every penny.

THIS GAME IS AMAZING! there is more world building and attention to detail in this one game than i have ever seen in even any modern game i've played. the puzzles are the perfect mix of challenging and intuitive, the writing is off the walls hilarious and i've found that they crack even funnier jokes before i can stop laughing at the previous one. just buy it.
